New SplashScreenUIManager and SplashScreenBehaviour classes added which will be the entrypoint into using this library. New test cases to ensure library is working as intended. Refactor Code.

manual/index.html.title: Splash Screen System | |
manual/index.html.keywords: Splash Screen System Splash Screen System is used for Show Splash Screen before starting game. Generally Its shown Disclaimer, EULA & 3rd Party pakages. Table of Contents Installation Usage Installation Install via Git URL You can also use the "Install from Git URL" option from Unity Package Manager to install the package. https://github.com/Studio-23-xyz/com.studio23.ss2.splashscreensystem.git#upm Usage Getting Started To start using the Splash Screen System. You need to take a few setup stepts Click on the 'Studio-23' available on the top navigation bar and navigate to Splash Screen System > Widget to create Disclaimer's Title & Description, EULA's Title & Description & 3rd Party's Images Data Scriptableobject. Then You need to assign those scriptable object into Inspector under Splash Screen Behaviour script. From here you can set Duration and Fadeduration. Using The Splash Screen System First Create a canvas, Then Create a Empty Game Object. Under Game object need to create a panel. Now, Need to create Title (Text), For Showing Title. Need To Create Scroll View. Under Viewport need to create a Description (Text) for showing Description. Then Need to create a Empty Game Object, Which contain two Button (AcceptButton, Decline Button) At last, you need to create GameObject which may contain 3rd Party's Logos. Or, You can place SplashScreenUIContainer Prefab into canvas. Scroll View, Button Panel (Game Object) [Under Button Panel ] Use the '```' symbols to start and end a code block. The starting symbol is followed by the language type used.
